mapper.insert: insert into plan(plan_id, day, title, x, y, open, close, user_id) values (plan_id_seq.nextval,#{day}, #{title}, #{x}, #{y}, #{open}, #{close}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select plan_id planId, day, title, x, y, open, close, user_id userId from plan where user_id = #{userId} order by day asc

select p.plan_id planId, p.day day, p.title title, p.x x, p.y y, p.open open, p.close close, p.user_id userId, u.truck_img truckImg, u.truck_name truckName, u.truck_food truckFood, u.phone phone, u.email email, u.id id from plan p , users u where p.user_id = u.user_id and to_char(sysdate, 'd')-1 = day and to_char(SYSDATE , 'HH24:MI:SS') between open and close
mapper.update: update plan set title = #{title}, open = #{open}, close = #{close}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}, day = #{day} where plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.select: select plan_id planId, day, title, x, y, open, close, user_id userId from (select plan_id, day, title, x, y, open, close, user_id from plan where user_id = #{userId} and day = #{day}) where to_char(to_date(#{open} , 'hh24:mi'), 'HH24:MI') between open and close OR to_char(to_date(#{close} , 'hh24:mi'), 'HH24:MI') between open and close
